response.original_title: NFL Films - Chicago Bears - The Complete History
response.overview: This two-disc set celebrates the rich history of the Chicago Bears, from the inception to today. Bonus program is the NFL Films production of Super Bowl XX, Bears big win over the Patriots, featuring the impenetrable 1985 Bears Defense and the colorful Jim McMahon. Includes tons of bonus features on the greatest Bears moments, games and players.
response.title: NFL Films - Chicago Bears - The Complete History

titles.title: Monsters of the Midway - The Complete History of the Chicago Bears
